Rear Access Board

The rear access board provides connections to the microcontrollers and different debugging points. It also has a slot for a mission payload camera.

The documentation for the BIRDS3 version of this board can be found here. The documentation for the BIRDS4 version of this board can be found here. Back

The BIRDS Project is maintained by the core team of students .
